roleset.name: giving legal rights to property

roles.note: Watch out for instances that refer to the license itself (paper or otherwise), rather than the act/state of giving/having rights.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on license-v.01, WordNet sense #4. Corresponds to VNcls patent-101.

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: According to their press release, Sentai Filmworks has announced their license of the TV anime No.6.

example.name: Not eventive. Refers to an artifact. .YY!
example.text: After failing a road sobriety test by blowing a .08% or more, the police will often ask you to hand over your driver's license on the spot
